name: UPLOADED (itch)
description:
UPLOADED is a Short Psychological Horror Experience by SolitaryStudios. A Filipino horror game developers.

I secretly created this game in just 3 days while my other teammates are working on our main horror game that is soon to be released on Steam called GoodNight.
This was the game: https://solitarystudios.itch.io/goodnight

PLOT: You're a YouTuber who has struggled to upload a video. Can this video ever be uploaded? We'll find out!



DONATIONS WILL HELP US TO FUND OUR UPCOMING GAMES
